title: GDP 8.5% - Interesting Bloomberg analysis, calls it a 'distortion'
selftext:
This analysis throws out the 8.5% figure and makes it a more modes, and expected, 6.5%. Surely the govt is aware.

[https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-29/india-s-economic-growth-unexpectedly-accelerates-to-above-8](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-29/india-s-economic-growth-unexpectedly-accelerates-to-above-8)
comments: Paywall. Can anyone post the content here?
Cooked up calculation. Includes GST (literally taxes stole from public).
